title: The Villainess Has Been Defeated Again and Again - Novel Updates

description:
The miserable end of the villainess must be because she was not vicious enough! Knowing that she had transmigrated as the villain of the otome game, Eureka decided to find the heroine and kill her before the game’s plot began.

If the male protagonist gets in the way, just kill them all. When making this decision, she did not consider her own ability and IQ?!>
